summary: The story of a notorious 1971 activist burglary of an FBI office that led to the Bureau's numerous abuses against dissidents being exposed.
cast: Bonnie Raines|John Raines|Bob Williamson|Keith Forsyth|Bill Davidon|Betty Medsger|Terry Neist|Athan Theoharis|J. Edgar Hoover|Sanford Ungar|Ben Bradlee|Katharine Graham|George McGovern|Bob Dole|Richard Nixon|Neil Welch|Anne Flitcraft|David Kairys|John J. Rooney|Carl Stern|Frank Church|Frederick Schwarz|Phil Hart|Nathan Raines|Mary Raines|Peter Gregus|Lauren A. Kennedy|Jonathan Joel Brennan|Rich Graff|Daniel S. Taylor|Dennis Brito|John Isgro|Kerry Malloy|Brian McCarthy|Matthew Smith|Danielle Varga|Marilyn Ness|Paul Darren Varricchio|Tom Davis
